title: The Woman Who Accepts her Fate - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Female Protagonist   R*pe
author: 偷吃大米
description:
She is born in a disabled family. She lived her life in poverty and as an outcast. She is beautiful and dignified, hard-working and simple, yet kind-hearted and hen-hearted.

At the age of sixteen, her mother entreated: “My dear daughter, it’s all because dad and mom do not have the capability. Mom begs you, please forgive mom, mom has let you down! Please do it for me, your father and brother and just accept fate. Mom will definitely repay you in the next life!”

She as a person who resigned herself to adversity accepted her fate. When the situation becomes unbearable……>
